item.title: ORID: Organ-Regional Information Driven Framework for Radiology Report Generation
item.description: ORID framework leverages organ-regional information to boost radiology report generation, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy by integrating multi-modal data and reducing noise from unrelated organs.
